body_html:
I don't believe testing was done very thoroughly for the python gradients :( if there are these for math_grad they would be here: https://github.com/petewarden/tensorflow_makefile/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/math_grad_test.py

But it doesn't look like there is one for this op.

body:
I don't believe testing was done very thoroughly for the python gradients :( if there are these for math_grad they would be here: https://github.com/petewarden/tensorflow_makefile/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/math_grad_test.py

But it doesn't look like there is one for this op.
